title: Is telepathy real? How does it work? I mean, is it between two very like minded and close individuals? - Quora

response.answer_text: It's been proven to exist by any sane scientific standard. If you're the sort who can sift through scientific papers, here you go:Page on deanradin.com It's not at all clear how telepathy works or any psychic ability for that matter.  What is known is that it doesn't appear to be a signal in the conventional sense.  Studies have demonstrated that related individuals who are emotionally attached to one another do better together than many others, but studies with artistic populations generally do better than anyone else. There was one study with an autistic child that demonstrated a near 100% success rate. Disregard the James Randi Foundation Million dollar challenge, it is not science, nor does it claim to be and isn't proof of anything.
